1000.name: EarlyEndOfFile
1000.short: The IBakedSource ending was reached unexpectedly.

1001.name: UnexpectedTokenType
1001.short: A token of type '{expected_type}' was expected, got '{actual_type}'.

1000.name: UnregisteredProcessorStatement
1000.short: A handler for this processor statement's key or value has not been registered.
1000.long: Processor statements will error on execution if no processor statement handler reports successful handling.

1000.name: InvalidLocalVariable
1000.short: A variable by this name ({name}) does not existing in the current scope, its ancestors, or globals.

1001.name: InvalidVariablePath
1001.short: '{path_part}' does not contain an object by the name '{null_part}.
1001.long: Operations regarding pathed variables will fail if any part of the path is null when accessed.

1000.name: NullInvocation
1000.short: A null value cannot be invoked.

1001.name: NonCallableInvocation
1001.short: A non-callable object cannot be invoked.
1001.long: BakedObjects that don't implement IBakedCallable cannot be invoked.
